website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy audio tower that makes a good focal point in large living rooms.
pros: Heavy duty construction is able to hold heavy audio equipment such as speakers and amplifiers
Adjustable shelving and drawers accommodate a variety of media items
cons: Difficult to assemble and move around

customer_reviews.title: Sauder Palladia Technology Pier in Cherry Finish = NICE!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I'm an old (female) bag with no one to help with these assembly projects, and I needed a piece of furniture on which to put my cable box, etc. So, I tackled it and succeeded! The instructions were quite good, and although it took me longer than most to put it together, I did it without any difficulty. It's very attractive and utilitarian–a very nice addition to my living room and it matches my other furniture. I wish it wasn't as deep as it is; a little flusher to the wall would have made it perfect. But it serves its purpose. Be careful how you assemble and treat it though, because it chips very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a printer stand in my home office. It was fairly easy to put together except for the aggravating back board piece (thick cardboard and just annoying to tack on!) I love that My Canon printer fit perfectly on the shelf and I will be able to store everything I wanted to there. It was a little darker than I expected so I’m not crazy about that but I’ll live. I bought it to match the desk of the same design. It is very sturdy & heavy to not be real wood. Great for the price, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Cabinet with Incorrect Assembly Instructions
customer_reviews.text: The delivery from Amazon was delayed by 4 days. The packing was very good. I like the cabinet as it uncluttered and housed my different devices like router, modem, printer etc. However the instructions in booklet are incorrect. The front vertical round edge molding in the booklet referenced as "End Molding" named "O" had to be removed and reinstalled again as the upper two shelves wouldn't be enter as mentioned in the last assembly step. The bottom drawer has instructions for putting 4 screws but there are only two holes. Also it does take a good 3-4 hours to assemble the cabinet considering you are told not to use powered phillips screw driver.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: SAUDER PRODUCTS ROCK!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive I might add!! The package came well protected and they had it wrapped like it was going into WAR!! ISIS couldn't even blow this up if they tried!! That's how well they had it protected!! Easy to put together and took me about 1 1/2 hours and the instructions were easy to follow! The finish is a dark cherry as you can tell when it sits beside my fireplace which has a cherry finish. Well worth the money and time that I put into it. I bought it to put my play station game and controllers. Very nice and Sauder makes nice products!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevinss

customer_reviews.title: Love this line
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 when they came on sale for each side of tv table. They are very sturdy and a nice warm dark cherry finish. Really like the palladia line by Sauder. I am a 55 y/o female and put these together alone on a rug. Pull it out of box piece by piece and lay out first; always check to see all the parts are there. Have a hammer and screw driver and plenty of time to put together
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: After a month still love it.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had one more shelf, easy to assemble but get a power screwdriver. Two pieces weren't labeled, but I figured it out. Not an heirloom but it perfect for tight spaces, college dorm, small living room. It does have some flex to it, but if you assemble with glue along with the included screws, I'm sure the wobble would be taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: jad

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I did not want to spend a lot of money, and needed something to put my TV box, PS4 Controller, and a wireless speaker on. It is nicer quality than I expected for cheap furniture, and it sure looks a lot better than the cheap table I had my devices on. There are holes in the back to run wires through, and one decent sized drawer in the bottom that we use to put all our PS4 Controllers and remote controls in. This worked exactly what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Thornton-Wiatt

customer_reviews.title: They do have a very nice appearance. Customer service was outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for a little extra storage. When this item arrived, it was smaller than expected and there is a lot of particle board material. Both these issues are on me for not carefully reading the dimensions and the building material used, so this is not a complaint. Two pieces were damaged /flawed (one for each unit). When I called the company service representative, she had the two parts sent to me immediately. Three to four days later, they arrived. The pieces have been replaced and the units ready to use. They do have a very nice appearance. Customer service was outstanding!!
customer_reviews.author: San Klu

customer_reviews.title: Matched my TV  stand
customer_reviews.text: I have a Sauder base cabinet that I use as a TV stand and this cabinet matches it perfectly. This cabinet is good quality and was relatively easy to assemble. I bought a large computer desk and three of there deluxe book cases twenty five years ago and they are still in very good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Henry W. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great media unit
customer_reviews.text: This product takes a little time to put together which is why I gave it a 4 for easy to assemble but it is well made and is not just a box to put your equipment in. It looks high end when completed. The instructions are very good and easy to follow. It came packaged very well and none of the pieces were damaged and all parts were in the box.
customer_reviews.author: nc lady

customer_reviews.title: A really nice piece of furnature
customer_reviews.text: This has become a work-in-progress place for research. Loose papers can go into the drawer and other material I put into plastic cases for reference. On top, at a very good height, is a scanner. This really works nicely for me. Caution on assembling these that you do not screw the screws in to hard. You can break through to the surface. It took a bit longer to assemble because of the drawer, but fairly easy if you follow the instructions carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Hornbogen

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my home office. First it was a pain to put together the draw would not slide in and we had to line up the rollers in the tracks and screw it in place. Second I measured the size of my printer (19.5 inches) before I ordered and it should have fit without issue, it doesn't. The with of the shelve area with the front side strips put on is 18 inches only the top of the unit is 22 inches; so now my printer sits on top, not the look I was going for but it will have to do. Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Assembles easily, yet solidly - just like all our other ...
customer_reviews.text: This unit is GORGEOUS! Assembles easily, yet solidly - just like all our other Sauder products. Palladia is a perfect match to Better Homes & Gardens Ashwood Road (also made by Sauder), so my library furniture all matches beautifully! This is exactly what I needed for the charging station and book return area I wanted to create. For others who have received their units with chips or messed up laminate - go on Sauder's website. Fill out their simple Web form and they will ship you a replacement piece for free, no questions asked, and it comes quickly (they had to replace our desktop)
customer_reviews.author: heart.u

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price for the look
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price on this and I would certainly order again. Looks a lot more expensive than price would suggest and seems fairly sturdy. I wouldn't say it's difficult to put together but it takes quite a bit of time and patience. It took us almost two hours to assemble. Also, all of the screws, nails, rollers, dowels, etc. come in one giant bag so you will spend 15 mins just separating and counting the parts. The directions are about average and there are certain steps where a little more detail would have been helpful. Note this is still made of MDF so in a sense, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Subpoena Envy

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a turntable stand. Easy assembly, but some joints are slightly misaligned. I had to make adjustments. All parts were included. Nice piece for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shelf, plus a large desk and lateral file to match. I am very impressed with this furniture. The instructions were well written and images were helpful. All pieces are very sturdy. I had to contact Sauder about a piece that was damaged due to shipper. Customer service rep was extremely polite and shipped me items free of charge, even though it wasn't their fault. I will definitely buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: American made product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Easy to assemble, the instructions are easy to follow and the screws and hardware are separated and labeled. Will definitely buy from this company again. Big plus, Made in The USA!
customer_reviews.author: Resa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Quality about as good as could be expected
customer_reviews.text: For a self assembled mass produced unit, this is good a value. The fit and finish could have been better. Assembly took a little "adjusting" though nothing that a little experience with self assembly furniture couldn't handle. I would like to see a better stabilizing support for the back of the cabinet. Depending on the thin cardboard for structural support doesn't get it. Assemble and place where you want it. Don't move it again unless you have to -- and then be careful. The drawer was a tight fit requiring some gentle (rubber mallet) encouragement to assemble. The rails are good and I expect the drawer to work faithfully for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent technology cabinet
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet is excellent for a computer or sound equipment. Putting it together requires that you follow the directions exactly. One thing that should be printed on the outside of the box is to either open the box to make a clean safe work area or move on to a clean short nap rug for assembly. That keeps the outside from being marred or scuffed. Looks great when it is assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Handy Pop

customer_reviews.title: Budget friendly and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This piece is absolutely beautiful. I got the vintage oak, which has a nice rustic tone. It really looks a lot more expensive than it is, and was very easy to put together. I was able to put it together by myself in under an hour and a half, even having very little furniture building experience and/or knowledge. I also ended up getting the matching end table because I love how amazing this Sauder Palladia collection looks, and hope to purchase more matching pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Meow86

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy stand for the price
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional printer stand. Sturdy and well made. Drawer opens and closes easily with no gaps. Great packaging especially on the corners. Would give five stars except for back enclosure is made of wood colored cardboard which looks cheap. also assembly directions could have better. Some pieces were not labeled and hardware was all in one bag. Which lead to needing to double check to make sure correct screws were being used. Would recommend to a friend and/or purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MeekoGray

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two to put on each end of my large screen TV. They are just the right height to still have wall space above, plus they look classy. Affordable price, I didn't want to spend alot. The shelves are nice and the bottom drawer is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and strong
customer_reviews.text: I have the desk, the file drawers and now this, so obviously I really like them. They have a rich look without being expensive. They are not easy to assemble, but they are very sturdy once built.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Sav

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Pleased. Dark cherry finish. Didn't take long to put together, easy to follow instructions. Only negative is the top piece came with a small sent in the front lip of it. It didn't take off the finish so you can only see the dent in certain lighting/angles. Not enough to go through the hassle of returning. Purchased to go with the matching Palladia tv stand, still waiting for that to be delivered. Will edit and add to review down the road to rate it's durability.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer0418

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time and is true to color. It works perfectly in my office. I was afraid it might be a little too tall for my large printer to be placed on the top shelf but it's pretty perfect. It was easy to assemble though it came in many many pieces. I would recommend this product in a more formal office setting.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: It’s an elegant furniture for your home!
customer_reviews.text: You need 2 people. Instructions are very helpful and easy to follow it. It took about an hour to assemble with my hubby. I love this brand. Very very sturdy. Deserve this money. Well package! Thank you everyone!
customer_reviews.author: FADIME D.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my fiance since he needed a designated office space. It's perfect. My only thing is that I didn't want to put the printer on top (as in one of the pictures) and it was big enough that I could only make it two shelves instead of three. In the interim, I have the extra shelf hidden away in case we want to use it later. I found assembly to actually be very easy, so I didn't share the experience that some people had.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Just right for an old stereo unit and lots of CDs. We wish it had been available in maple or oak, but life can be cruel at times. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Joan R

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and inaccurately drilled
customer_reviews.text: the hole patterns are off. the edges didn't line up for me I had to drill and grind down one of the moldings to look good. one of the screw locks broke with little force. I replaced it with left over parts from another shelf unit.
customer_reviews.author: Pendragon

customer_reviews.title: will purchase another!
customer_reviews.text: a beautiful piece. can fit all kinds of items on it, and on the removable shelves to fit. patience and some time will be needed to put together, but its worth it for the final finished product. the instructions are well documented and with some helpful hints along the way. will purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: ScottS

customer_reviews.title: Leaves alot to be desired
customer_reviews.text: One of these days you'd think I'd learn from past mistakes and quit buying Sauder Palladia furniture. I must be a glutton for punishment. It looks cheap, feels cheap, assembly is not terribly difficult but the instructions aren't broken down to its simplest explanation. The back part of the cabinet doesn't fit the cabinet so you will have extra cardboard hanging out somewhere. Also, no matter how much of a perfectionist you are it will be offer kilter a bit and rock a tad. Ya get what you pay for so buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: D.K.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Much taller than I thought it would be, it fits all the electrical components that had been sitting on either the floor or my dresser in my bedroom. Cheaply constructed, but cheaply priced. I'm not annoyed looking at it and I'm no longer leaning to the ground to start my sound machine every night.
customer_reviews.author: E. Leung

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived in perfect shape with original bumpers still in place and very ...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in perfect shape with original bumpers still in place and very little wear on the corners from shipping. Instructions were great except for front skirt. Put middle piece on before corner pieces. I dinged a corner piece while trying to get the center piece between the 2 corners (as instructed). The corner pieces fit better after getting the center piece in anyway. Turned out quite beautiful and matches mahogany finish from HON pretty close.
customer_reviews.author: spoiledrottencotton

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and compact cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking cabinet. I put my home theater console, printer and DVD on the shelves. The bottom drawer is more spacious than it appears. It wasn't too hard to put together and the finish looks like it'll hold up. I replaced a 6 ft entertainment center with this (gave away the big tube TV and VHS tapes). Now my room looks a lot bigger. This would be nice anywhere you need some storage in a small space. The back is closed but there are holes to punch out for power cords.
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: and its american made.
customer_reviews.text: very nice cabinet, I'm using for my audio system. Its well made of top quality components. I used glue when putting it together but its not need nor is it even required, but I do because it adds a few years to compressed fiber furniture. I'm very happy with this cabinet and will be ordering another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: shadow692010

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our Entertainment Center
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and perfect for my tv and stereo. I put my 32" flat screen tv on top and my bookshelf stereo on the second shelf. This was perfect for our living room. the color is a little reddish but doesnt seem as red as the color in the picture. It matched great with our other furniture. Very nice quality. One little flaw on one of the side panels but we were able to put that side up against a wall and no one will ever know.
customer_reviews.author: empierce

customer_reviews.title: Good cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Well designed cabinet kit, assembly instructions were clear. Very sturdy, and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: J. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Good piece for the price
customer_reviews.text: This goes together like an IKEA piece of furniture. Takes a bit of time but easy enough. Two pieces came with the veneer damaged, but a call to Sauder and these were replaced by mail a few days later. Good customer service. Check the dimensions carefully; this is kind of uniquely shaped. It fits perfectly into the space we have and works well to house our entertainment center.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Very nice printer stand.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for holding the printer and paper and printing supplies. Very easy to put together too! A few of the screws were missing, but I had extra ones at home that worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cani2006

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to screw sizes
customer_reviews.text: Only problem I had was that I didn't compare screws to pictures and wound up puncturing the top. My bad, otherwise assembly was OK. I've assembled a number of Sauder items over the years and enjoy their products..
customer_reviews.author: Mark I OConnor

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is fantastic!! Reasonable price, beautiful design and not too difficult to put together, step by step directions were really easy to follow Has plenty of storage space on shelves and I love that it has a drawer Its a great way to store my printer and desktop tower so I no longer need a big desk in my bedroom I would totally recommend it
customer_reviews.author: lennon587

customer_reviews.title: poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: great product and easy to put together. Solid 1.5 hours...too bad I purchased to soon and Amazon wont honor $50 price decrease
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: pretty stronger, 3 deparment with the cords acces back ...
customer_reviews.text: i buy for my room , for my TV and my xbox one , and i LOVEE it , pretty stronger , 3 deparment with the cords acces back already for your dvd consoles whatever , i put my TV in the top beacuse is 32 inches , and guys this is really good for when you are in the bed , and you dont need to have to sit in a chair cpouples of hours , you can play from the bed and with this item very confortable , beacuse is very tight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Looks way more expensive than it is. I’ve only had it for a short tome but it seems to be holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Chute

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Easy to assemble. Plenty of shelf and storage space. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: George Naftzinger

customer_reviews.title: Come with missing parts
customer_reviews.text: It misses part H for me. It looks very low quality. have to return it. pretty bulky. It took me quite a lot of time to repack and move it out of the door.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: very nice looking pcs of furniture. Looks a lot more expensive than it was. only gripe is that the feet on the bottom are a little crooked. Enough to notice from across the room. We left the center pcs out of the bottom due to the heater vent underneath the unit so if we had left it in you probably would not have noticed the crooked legs
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Kooker

customer_reviews.title: they look beautiful
customer_reviews.text: They look very expensive and were put together fairly easily. One piece was cracked and sauderer replaced it quickly. Since I purchased 2, we put one together. After the replacement piece arrived we assembled the second one, and a second piece was a bit rough/marred in spots; since it was not visible, we completed it. I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Much higher quality than the particle board furniture of years ago ..... easy assembly ..... nicely packaged
customer_reviews.author: JEFF WALSH

customer_reviews.title: Love this piece
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece. Beautiful piece of furniture. Looks great with my cherry desk. I bought it to use for printer and supplies and it works great. Just the right height. Took a couple of hours to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy LTurner

customer_reviews.title: Align the hole for drawer knob - even if the others are off.!
customer_reviews.text: Took 3 hours to assemble- hardest part was the drawer- holes were not aligned. But is now working out fine. Being 83 is probably why it took me so long.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great when you take it out of the package
customer_reviews.text: Looks great when you take it out of the package. Not easy to put together and it is not at all durable. If you don't ever knock it, it will probably be ok. Very low quality particle board covered by a nice looking finish. What I would expect had it cost $40, but not the $125 I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Box was beat up when it was delivered. Edges are scraped or broken. Would return it if it wasn’t such a hassle to repackage and the box it was delivered and hadn’t been destroyed. Would not buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Carol Barbanell

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage for TV Accessories
customer_reviews.text: We recently had our TV mounted over the fireplace and needed storage for all the accessories. This was perfect. Well made and real value and quality craftsmanship. Shelf heights are adjustable. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Meechie

customer_reviews.title: Matches my desk perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bookcase. I have the desk that matches. It is very sturdy and looks much more expensive. It takes a while to put together but well worth it when you are done.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Sauder Palladia Technology Pier Free Standing Cabinet in dark cherry
customer_reviews.text: I love this cabinet as it was just what I was looking for. Arrived in perfect condition and very well wrapped. The instructions are easy to follow and took about 1-1/2 hours to put together. The shelves can be positioned to your liking and the drawer is quite deep and the color is a deep Cherry. Sauder products are very well made and all their instructions are clear and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent look and price!!
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is awesome. Super happy with this purchase. I got 2 for each side of my fireplace. This cabinet gives you the look of an expensive cabinet without paying the extra cash. Excellent price, can't go wrong with it. They were securely shipped, the only thing that got me mad was that the guy from UPS dropped them at my neighbor's house, luckily we are friends. UPS should be more careful about that. Totally recommend this! 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Latko

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The size, color and style fit right in with the other furniture in my computer room.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and color. Nice weight. A little tedious to put together but the directions were extremely simple and easy to follow. Very nice product! I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Val G.

customer_reviews.title: Good piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as an addition to our home gym to hold the DVD player and all the exercise books and DVDs. Great product and easy to put together if you have assembled modular furniture before. The wood quality is what is generally available - not hardwood except for some of the pieces - most of the pieces are MDF with veneers. All in all, a good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: MKJ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for a home office
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of furniture, the drawer is large enough to hold two reams of paper side by side, as well as lots of other office supplies. It is very attractive, and went together very easily. The directions were clear and easy to follow and all of the holes were drilled in the right places.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Such good quality, after purchasing the desk bought this piece for extra storage and to add my printer on it
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: It looks good and serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: This is a fairly sturdy piece of furniture if you're not moving it around a lot. The cherry color matches my other furniture nearly perfectly. The storage drawer is large and deep and all of my components (DVR/Cable converter, DVD/VCR, Blu-Ray Player, X-Box 360) fit with plenty of room to spare. I still have room on the top two shelves for my X-Box One and Kinect!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Brogan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Given the cost, it's well made. Perfectly suited for my usage. I needed a free-standing cabinet that could hold a wireless printer on top, charging gadgets in the middle and space for print supplies. And also match the rest of the furniture in my office. This was near perfect match. Putting it together was easy but when you're completing the last few steps it's helpful to have a second person around to hold parts on place. I've ordered a second one to hold a wireless scanner and more supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: When I finally got it put together it looks great and is very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: When I finally got it put together it looks great and is very sturdy! However, like most things you have to put together, the directions could have been more clear. Not all pieces were labeled with a part number to correspond to the directions and it would have been very helpful if some of the pieces had a sticker that indicated front or back. I bought 2, so the 2nd one should be a breeze to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Ann N.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It is great, the drawers do not line up to close smoothly, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: Fair quality product. Watch price goes up and down. I over paid.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: all pieces fit together perfectly and was pretty easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: As usual with Sauder products, all pieces fit together perfectly and was pretty easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stand
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, stylish, and expensive-looking. Sturdy and of very high quality. If you assemble it correctly, with special attention paid to accurate coaptation of edges, you can hardly find anything wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amir L.

customer_reviews.title: It's a little small
customer_reviews.text: My printer is too big to fit on the shelves, but this is a great smaller piece that won't overpower your office furniture. It goes well in our home office. Easy to put together, and the drawer at the bottom is large.
customer_reviews.author: PRM

customer_reviews.title: Not all pieces were created equal.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the pieces did not quite fit together properly. I had to sand one piece because it was noticeably longer that the other. Looks good in the theater room though. Holds my receiver nicely. Other than not fitting together correctly it looks good and functions like i wanted it to.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Style Shelving
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of furniture. Easy to assemble and looks better than what I expected. I bought it for TV components but after deciding not to hang my flat screen TV on the wall I've used it as a piece in my living room holding candles and decor items. The bottom drawer is a nice feature too. Definitely recommend this quality piece.
customer_reviews.author: Kakoo

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality item for pressboard and veneer construction
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality item for pressboard and veneer construction. Extremely sturdy. Easy to scratch though. We are using it as a secondary kitchen pantry to store cokes, water, beer, etc, And we keep dog food and treats in the drawer. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne M Powell

customer_reviews.title: Strong and good looking.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Looks good. Had my son-in-law assemble it. He did a much better job than your "professionals" did on the desk I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie S.

customer_reviews.title: but was easily remedied by calling customer service
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars, but there's some fitment issues with the drawer. It arrived missing a couple of screws, but was easily remedied by calling customer service. Overall a very nice piece, and goes well with the decor of the room.
customer_reviews.author: shizzle1

customer_reviews.title: Great bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: Bookshelve is exactly what I was looking for, takes a little time to built but very nice. Shipped fast as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The unit had several serious scuff marks on the edges ...
customer_reviews.text: The unit had several serious scuff marks on the edges of several important pieces. The unit was packed very well and the shipping box exterior was undamaged, showing no signs of rough treatment. This can only lead me to believe that the damages may have occurred during the initial packaging. Most were well camoflaged with scratch treatment. The piece overall suits my needs perfectly and looks very well in my music room
customer_reviews.author: TJI in Ga

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my printer stand. Not hard to put together and sturdier than I thought it would be. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Very nice piece.
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and well engineered. Everything fits great, instructions are clear, and you end up with a very solid, very nice looking piece of furniture that looks like it came from a furniture store, not in a box.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cabinet but Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I love the sturdiness of the cabinet but it came scratched. They pack it so tight without enough foam, that the panels hit each other during shipping and damages it. And it's such a shame because it's a beautiful cabinet. And the scratch is in front, on top so you can't hide it. But it's easier for me to fix it myself than go through the hassle of exchanging it.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet for printers
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small low profile cabinet that would hold both of my printers and I came across this one. Not that expensive and very well made, worth the money. I was able to fit both printers on the two shelves and leave the top empty for my wife to put some random nic-nacks on. The drawer doesn't hold much (a few reams of paper and some smaller supplies) but it is small and not supposed to hold a whole lot. Wonderful costumer service, the drawer bottom was damaged during shipping and the company had a new one at my house within a couple of days. Looks great also.
customer_reviews.author: Barkus Thamby

customer_reviews.title: Good solid piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Made in USA. Comes with well written sensible instructions and it shows the actual size of screws on each page. This avoids all confusion when putting the pieces together. Good solid piece of furniture. Looks great in our room and stores my Surround sound receiver, Xfinity cable box, Wifi router and my DVD player. Adjustable shelves. LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nidhin Pad

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it says it is!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice piece of inexpensive furniture that looks like it should cost more, was easy to put together and is very sturdy. It really is all it claims to be!
customer_reviews.author: hmcon

customer_reviews.title: Great Solution for a Overcrowded Desk
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and pretty easy to put together. It looks really nice beside my desk. Amazon had the lowest price and it was pretty heavy so I am glad I was able to have it deliver.
customer_reviews.author: PapaSquirrel57

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tech Pier
customer_reviews.text: Recommend for value. Product arrived o time without any damage. It was very easy to assemble and looks good in the library with the matching desk. Since the picture has a printer on top, it may be taller than you think. It is a bit of a stretch to pick up print out while sitting at the desk.
customer_reviews.author: CMR

customer_reviews.title: My friends want one now
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of furniture for my home office. I have my printer on top; cables, cords, and whatnot in the drawer; and files and software on the shelves. I've shown it off to friends, and they all want their own now and are thinking about getting one and how they could use it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Gia

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cabinet - Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This is nice piece of furniture for the price. I was impressed as it looks much more expensive than it costs. Quality parts and hardware, not a pressboard piece. I use it for an audio cabinet for old school stereo components
customer_reviews.author: FozCat

customer_reviews.title: Great for working from home office!
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect! Just what I needed. I work from home and this fit everything so nicely and tucked away the cords out of view. Great value for the price— thank you!!! (And much cheaper than the one sold at Target)
customer_reviews.author: Traci Walker

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece for the price. Took about 2 hours to put together but we had all pieces and as long as you're patient and gentle while putting it together, it's a good buy. It's not solid wood, but I didn't expect that given what we paid. Overall, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Sheets

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, looks good. Be careful opening with your box knife, package has no barrier between outside and cabinet. Ended up putting a slice in the finished side of cabinet, my fault, but not happy with the thin sides of the package. Otherwise, quite pleased with product.
customer_reviews.author: TedS

customer_reviews.title: Office Gear
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping! Everything was package neatly without any defects. Looks nice. Can't wait to put it to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brad S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, very solid
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, very solid, drawer moves easily. Took a while to assemble but the instructions are very good, the best I have ever read. The back does not have enough holes for cords, you may have to make another hole or two.
customer_reviews.author: My Name Is Nobody

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful with sturdy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Very nice finish and color. Assembly didnt take very long. Very sturdy after assembly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality entertainment stand. It's heavy and looks really nice. We use it as a stereo shelf with a turntable. It wasn't hard to put together, about average for something like this. It came well packed. No damage that I could see. I recommend this stand.
customer_reviews.author: High-Hate

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality and finish and I should have got ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality and finish and I should have got two of them but take 2-3 hours to put together .. They also have the taller style but heavier box .. I also love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shelf
customer_reviews.text: Matches the L shaped desk, was not too difficult to assemble (took about two hours), great place to keep my printer and supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley A. Hoenig

customer_reviews.title: No bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: A lot of pieces and not the best but good enough if you are not hard on your furniture. It's really paper on compressed board but looks nice in my corner. Also a very heavy piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: Love The Color!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and very sturdy! This is where we put our karaoke machine and other equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy quality like everything I purchased from Sauder. Easy to put together - just follow the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Marina M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful storage cabinet for small area.
customer_reviews.text: Love this beautiful cabinet. Needed something to put against a narrow wall in bedroom for TV cable box and DVD player. Everything fits perfectly, with room for books, etc. My husband and I are thrilled with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Library fairy

product_meta.title: Sauder Palladia Technology Pier, Select Cherry finish
product_meta.description: Color:Select Cherry FinishYou can never have too much storage space. Give your home an upgrade by adding convenient storage options and impeccable style with this technology pier from the Palladia collection. This attractive stand features a spacious open shelving area for you to store and display anything your little heart desires – a speaker system, your collection of novels, the DVD player and pictures of your family too. Its two adjustable shelves have the ability to move to different heights to create flexible storage options for items of all shapes and sizes. It also includes a lower drawer that opens and closes on smooth metal runners for additional hidden storage space. Its enclosed back panel includes cord access so you can keep all your wires neat and out of sight. It's detailed with a framed panel door and nickel hardware to give it an extra touch of class and beauty. Finished in Select Cherry, this handsome technology pier adds style and functionality to any room in your home.
feature_bullets: Two adjustable shelves for flexible storage options
Drawer with metal runners and safety stops keep you and your family safe
Quick and easy assembly with patented T-slot drawer system
Enclosed back cut-outs allow a convenient path for cables and cords

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars508 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
